Twitter#

import sys
sys.path.append("..")

Import#

from finnlp.data_sources.social_media.twitter import Twitter_Downloader

Config#

stock = "AAPL"
start_date = "2023-01-01"
end_date = "2023-01-05"

Downloader#

downloader = Twitter_Downloader()

downloader.download(start_date, end_date,stock)

downloader.dataframe.shape
